message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm proposing a starting price of $1,300,000.  I believe this is a fair reflection of its worth and potential.

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,100,000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering my budget and the value I'm looking for in a product like this.

Bob, thanks for your counteroffer. I understand your perspective on the value, however, I can't let go of this product for anything less than $1,225,000. This offer reflects a significant compromise on my end, while still acknowledging the value you'll gain.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above $1,200,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $1,200,000. I believe this is a fair price for the product and I'm confident we can come to an agreement here.
